text: La Colombe may refer to: *La Colombe, Loir-et-Cher, a commune in the Loir-et- Cher département, France *La Colombe, Manche, a commune in the Manche département, France *La Colombe (cabaret), a Parisian cabaret in the sixties, France *La colombe, an opera by Charles Gounod (1860) *La Colombe (Picasso), a lithograph of a dove *"La Colombe" (song), a song by Jacques Brel *La Colombe Coffee Roasters, a coffee company headquartered in Philadelphia ==Related== *Colombe, a commune in the Isère département, France *Colombe-lès-Vesoul, a commune in the Haute-Saône département, France *Colombes, a commune in the Hauts-de-Seine département, France
title: La Colombe
